reg_info.act_under: Social Contract Act, 1993   Loi de 1993 sur le contrat social

content.content: 1. (1) If the daily allowance payable to any person described in section 2 exceeds $135, the allowance is reduced to the greater of, (a) 96.17 per cent of the original daily allowance; and (b) $135.  O. Reg. 591/93, s. 1 (1). (2) Subsection (1) applies in respect of daily allowances earned after August 10, 1993 and before April 1, 1994.  O. Reg. 317/94, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Regulation applies to any person, other than a public servant, appointed to an office or as a member of an agency, board, commission or other body if the member was appointed by the Lieutenant Governor in Council or by a member of the Executive Council.  O. Reg. 591/93, s. 2.
